title: Ticket #7345: Bindings docs should be clear about thread safety
description:
In https://github.com/reanahub/reana-job-controller/issues/190 , a user ran head-first into the lack of thread safety on the Schedd object, which is a persistent problem across many of our bindings objects.

We don't have any near-term prospect of making them thread-safe, but we should at least document the lack of it. Probably in both the Schedd docstring, and in some separate section where we explicitly discuss thread safety.

If time permits, we could add some quick recipes for getting per-thread objects in a convenient way.
